title: One To Watch Me
description: My elite life is a setup. It came at a steep price of high expectations and pressure. Then, a much-needed vacation abruptly turned into chaos. Iâ€™m being watched, followed and ... worshipped. Inhibitions are pushed, boundaries tested, privacy invaded. All the while I feel eyes on me. Can I trust the mysterious stranger who awakens my body and soul?
author: Alicia  Maxwell
